segments.text: Mr . Wilson . We very regret the mistakes in goods . I am very sorry and we are responsible for the mistake .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have no choice but to hold you responsible for the loss we sustained .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The first problem is supposed to be solved after the investigation . About the second problem , I admit it's our fault , so we will exchange all merchandise that falls short of our sample .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . I hope there won't be such things .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can assure you that such a thing today will never happen again in future delivery . We have made the plan to improve the package of our exported goods .
segments.speaker: S1
